Translations.Text: Kare-ra ga me no hen ni sore o miru toki, fushin-sha-tachi no kao wa kanashimi ni kumoru. `Kore ga anata gata no motomete ita mono (yakusoku no joju)dearu.' To tsuge rareru

Gen tte yaru ga i. `Anata gata wa kangaenai no ka, moshi arra ga, watashi ya watashi to issho no mono o horobosa rete mo, mata jihi o atae rarete mo, oyoso fushin-sha o tsuretsuna chobatsu kara sukuu mono wa daredearou ka

Itte yaru ga i. `Kare wa jihi amaneku okata de arare, watashi-tachi wa kare o shinko shi, kare ni (subetewo) takusu. Yagate anata gata wa, akirakana kago no naka ni iru mono ga daredearu no ka o shirudearou
Itte yaru ga i. `Anata gata wa kangaenai no ka. Moshi aru asa, anata gata no mizu ga chika ni shizumi sattanaraba, waki deru mizu o, anata gata ni motaraseru mono wa, ittai daredearu no ka
Nun. Fude ni chikai kete, mata kaita mono ni oite chikau
Omo no onkei ni oite, anata wa kichigaide wanai
Iya, hontoni anata ni wa, tsukinai hosho ga arou
Hontoni anata wa, sukona tokusei o sonaete iru
Yagate anata wa miyou, kare-ra mo mata mirudearou
Anata gata no dare ga kichigaidearu ka o
Hontoni anata no omo wa,-do kara mayoi satta mono o, mottomo yoku shitte ora re, mata michibika rete iru mono o mottomo yoku shiri tsukusa reru katadearu
Sorede anata wa (shinri o) hinin suru mono ni shitagatte wa naranai
Kare-ra no negai wa, anata ga ayumiyoru koto de, so nareba kare-ra mo dakyo shitai nodearu
Anata wa, hiretsuna chikai o tateru don'na mono ni mo kutsuju shite wa naranai
Chusho shi, waruguchi o ii aruku mono
zenji o samatage, okite ni somuku tsumibukaimono
ranbo (zangyaku)na-sha, sono soto sujo no iyashi-sha
tomi to (oku no) shijo o motte iru tame ni (sodearu, korera no mono ni shitagatte wa naranai)
Kare ni waga shirushi ga Satoru å”± Sa reru to,`sore wa mukashi no monogataridesu.' To iu
